title: Microsoft Outlook Weather Location Preferences
description: Preferences for Microsoft Outlook Weather Location Functionality

DefaultWeatherLocation.title: Default Weather Location
DefaultWeatherLocation.description: (DefaultWeatherLocation)-Set default location for weather in calendar view. Use the format returned by the weather location search within Outlook

Weather_update_automatically.title: Disable Automatic Updating of Weather Location
Weather_update_automatically.description: (Weather_update_automatically)-Prevent users from choosing Update Location Automatically for weather location
